text: The Musée de l'Air et de l'Espace (Air & Space Museum) is the main French aviation and space museum. It is inside Paris-Le Bourget international airport. == Description == The Musée de l'Air et de l'Espace has two main sites : the museum itself, located in the old terminal of the airport, and reserves set up outside on the other side of the runway. The collections of the museum include : Boeing 727,Boeing 747, Concorde, Dassault Mirage III, Dassault Mirage IV, Dassault Mirage 2000A, Dassault Rafale A, Douglas C-47 Skytrain, Focke-Wulf Fw 190, Republic P-47 Thunderbolt, SNCAN N.2501 Noratlas, Supermarine Spitfire... == Gallery == === Aircraft on display in halls === Image:Airco_DH.9_2_(MAE).JPG|Airco DH.9 Image:Bernard_191_GR_- _Oiseau_Canari.JPG|Bernard 191.
